Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "I think the human heart is a really important thing. If a person's gonna decide to commit murder, plan it out, get everything ready, and actually carry it out, you'd need an incredibly strong force of the heart. The heart is what moves people."
Umineko Project (UP): "I think the human heart is a really important thing. For a person to decide to commit murder, plan it out, get everything ready, and actually carry it out, that'd take an incredibly strong force of the heart. The heart is what moves people."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I think the human heart is a really important thing. If a person's gonna decide to commit murder, plan it out, get everything ready, and actually carry it out, you'd need an incredibly strong force of the heart. The heart is what moves people."
PC Japanese (JP): 「人の心ってのは、すごく重要だと思うんだ。人間が、殺人を決意し、計画し準備し、実行に踏み切るには、ものすごい大きな心の力が必要なはずなんだ。人は、心で動いてるんだぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「人の心ってのは、すごく重要だと思うんだ。人間が、殺人を決意し、計画し準備し、実行に踏み切るには、ものすごい大きな心の力が必要なはずなんだ。人は、心で動いてるんだぜ」
Russian (RU): "По‐моему, сердце имеет большое значение. Если человек решает пойти на убийство, планирует его, всё подготавливает и на самом деле совершает, для этого нужно невероятно сильное сердце. Именно оно движет людьми."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu acredito que o coração humano seja muito importante. Para que uma pessoa decida cometer um assassinato, planeje ele, prepare cada detalhe e realmente o conduza, é necessário um forte poder do coração. O coração é o que move as pessoas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我覺得，人心這種東西是非常重要的。人類決意殺人，定計划、做準備，豁出去實行，是需要非常非常大的決心的。人，可是憑心而動的啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我觉得，人心这种东西是非常重要的。人类决意杀人，定计划、做准备，豁出去实行，是需要非常非常大的决心的。人，可是凭心而动的啊。」

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他邊這般說著，邊回頭微笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他边这般说着，边回头微笑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Parlando, mi guardava e sorrideva.

Steam (ST): ...Before today, I used to like novels that focused on exposing tricks.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Before today, I used to like novels that focused on exposing the tricks.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……私は今日まで、トリックを暴くことを主体にした、ハウダニットを探る作品を好んできた。
Russian (RU): ......До сегодняшнего дня я любила романы, направленные на разоблачение трюков.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Até aquele dia, eu costumava gostar de obras que focassem em expor os truques.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我直到今天為止，一直都喜好以揭穿詭計為主體的，探求 howdunit 的作品。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我直到今天为止，一直都喜好以揭穿诡计为主体的，探求 howdunit 的作品。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Prima di oggi, tendevo ad amare i romanzi che si concentravano sul rivelare il trucco.

Steam (ST): However, I decided to look for novels like the ones he recommended in the future.
Umineko Project (UP): However, I decided to look for novels like the ones he recommended in the future.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, I decided to look for novels like the ones he recommended in the future.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、今日からは彼の勧める、そういう作品を探してみようと思った。
Russian (RU): Но я решила в будущем прочитать и те, которые он порекомендовал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas decidi que procuraria pelos livros que ele recomendasse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過從今天開始，我想去找找他所推薦的那類作品了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过从今天开始，我想去找找他所推荐的那类作品了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, in seguito ho deciso di cercare romanzi come quelli che mi aveva raccomandato.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "I don't like neglecting the heart. ......The heart is what makes people move."
Umineko Project (UP): "I don't like ignoring the heart. .........The heart is what drives people to act."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I don't like ignoring the heart. .........The heart is what makes people move."
PC Japanese (JP): 「心ってやつを、俺は蔑ろにしたくない。………人は、心で動いてるんだからな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「心ってやつを、俺は蔑ろにしたくない。………人は、心で動いてるんだからな」
Russian (RU): "Мне не нравится игнорировать сердце. .........Именно оно движет людьми."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não gosto de ignorar o coração. .........O coração é o que move as pessoas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我不想輕視，心這種東西。………畢竟，人是憑心而動的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我不想轻视，心这种东西。………毕竟，人是凭心而动的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non mi piace ignorare il cuore. ... Il cuore è ciò che muove le persone."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "...Yeah. I think you're right..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yes. I think you're right......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Yeah. I think you're right......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうですね。仰る通りだと思います……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうですね。仰る通りだと思います……」
Russian (RU): "......Да. Думаю, так и есть......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim. Eu acho que você tem razão......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是呢。我覺得，您說得對……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呢。我觉得，您说得对……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Già. Penso che tu abbia ragione..."

Steam (ST): This isn't limited to the mystery genre. All humans are moved by their hearts all the time.
Umineko Project (UP): This isn't limited to the mystery genre.{n}All people, at all times, are driven by their hearts.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This isn't limited to the mystery genre. All humans are moved by their hearts all the time.
PC Japanese (JP): ミステリーだけに、限らない。人は誰だって、何にだって、心で動いている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ミステリーだけに、限らない。{n}人は誰だって、何にだって、心で動いている。
Russian (RU): И не только в детективном жанре.{n}Всеми людьми всё время движут их сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso não é limitado ao gênero do mistério.{n}Todas as pessoas, o tempo todo, são movidas pelos seus corações.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並不僅限於推理劇。{n}人不論誰，不論對於任何事，都是在憑心而動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并不仅限于推理剧。{n}人不论谁，不论对于任何事，都是在凭心而动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non è limitato al genere giallo. Tutti gli umani sono spinti dai loro cuori.

Steam (ST): Being able to notice the heart is what allows for interactions between people... ...no, interactions between hearts.
Umineko Project (UP): Figuring out the heart is the essence of interactions between people—no, interactions between hearts.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Being able to notice the heart is what allows for interactions between people......no, interactions between hearts.
PC Japanese (JP): それを察することが、人との交流、……いや、心の交流なのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを察することが、人との交流、……いや、心の交流なのだ。
Russian (RU): Способность заметить сердце — вот что позволяет людям взаимодействовать между собой...... нет, между сердцами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Descobrir o coração é a essência da interação entre as pessoas — não, a interação entre corações.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 體察人心，即是人與人的交流，……不，心與心的交流。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 体察人心，即是人与人的交流，……不，心与心的交流。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Essere in grado di accorgersi del cuore è ciò che permette l'interazione tra le persone... no, l'interazione tra i cuori.

Steam (ST): None of us humans can live on our own. And yet, we have no way of peeking into the hearts of others.
Umineko Project (UP): None of us humans can live on our own.{n}And yet, we have no way of peeking into the hearts of others.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): None of us humans can live on our own. And yet, we have no way of peeking into the hearts of others.
PC Japanese (JP): 私たち人間は、誰もひとりでは生きられない。なのに、相手の心を覗く術を持たない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私たち人間は、誰もひとりでは生きられない。{n}なのに、相手の心を覗く術を持たない。
Russian (RU): Ни один человек не может жить сам по себе.{n}И всё же мы не можем заглянуть в сердца других.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nenhum de nós, humanos, vivemos sozinhos.{n}E mesmo assim, nós não temos como espiar dentro do coração dos outros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們人類，無論誰都無法一個人活下去。{n}可儘管如此，我們卻又沒有窺視對方的心的方法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们人类，无论谁都无法一个人活下去。{n}可尽管如此，我们却又没有窥视对方的心的方法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nessuno di noi umani può vivere da solo. Eppure, non abbiamo modo di spiare nei cuori degli altri.

Steam (ST): That's why every meeting between people...is a mystery of the heart.
Umineko Project (UP): That's why every meeting between people............is its own mystery of the heart.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's why every meeting between people......is a mystery of the heart.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、人との出会いの数だけ、…………心のミステリーがある。
Russian (RU): Вот почему каждая встреча между людьми......... тайна сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É por isso que cada encontro entre pessoas............é um mistério único do coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，遇到多少人，…………就有多少個心之推理劇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，遇到多少人，…………就有多少个心之推理剧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È per questo che gli incontri tra persone... sono un mistero del cuore.

Steam (ST): Finding those, reasoning about them, and understanding each other is the key to interactions between people and hearts.
Umineko Project (UP): Encountering those mysteries, reasoning about them, and understanding them, is what allows people and hearts to connect with one another.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Finding those, reasoning about them, and understanding each other is the key to interactions between people and hearts.
PC Japanese (JP): それに触れ、推理し、理解し合うことで、人は心は、交流できるのだ。
Russian (RU): Искать её, рассуждать о ней и понимать друг друга — ключ к взаимодействию между людьми и сердцами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Encontrar esses mistérios, raciocinar sobre eles e entendê‐los é o que permite que pessoas e corações se conectem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 通過觸及、推理、互相理解彼此的心，人就能得以進行，心靈的交流。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 通过触及、推理、互相理解彼此的心，人就能得以进行，心灵的交流。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Trovarli, ragionarci su e capirli a vicenda è la chiave nell'interazione tra persone e cuori.

Steam (ST): The two of us are here, all alone, talking together about mysteries.
Umineko Project (UP): The two of us are here, by ourselves, talking together about mysteries.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The two of us are here, all alone, talking together about mysteries.
PC Japanese (JP): 私たちはここで二人きりで、ミステリーを議論し合ってる。
Russian (RU): Мы вдвоём наедине обсуждаем детективы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós dois que estamos aqui, por nós mesmos, falamos juntos sobre mistérios.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們在此兩人獨處地討論推理劇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们在此两人独处地讨论推理剧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Noi due siamo qui, tutti soli, a parlare di gialli.

Steam (ST): And through that...
Umineko Project (UP): And through that...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And through that...
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれを通して。
Russian (RU): И так...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E através disso...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，我們還在通過這個。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，我们还在通过这个。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E attraverso ciò...

Steam (ST): We are searching out each other's hearts, speaking of the heart's mysteries...
Umineko Project (UP): ...we are exploring each other's heart and debating its mysteries......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We are searching out each other's hearts, speaking of the heart's mysteries......
PC Japanese (JP): 私たちは互いの心を探り合い、心のミステリーを議論し合っている……。
Russian (RU): Мы постигаем сердца друг друга, говоря о тайнах сердца......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Nós exploramos o coração um do outro enquanto debatemos o seu mistério......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 互相探尋著彼此的心，討論著人心的推理劇……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 互相探寻着彼此的心，讨论着人心的推理剧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): stiamo cercando vicendevolmente i nostri cuori, parlando dei misteri del cuore...

Steam (ST): I want you to feel about me... ...the way I feel about you.
Umineko Project (UP): I want you to feel about me......the way I feel about you.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I want you to feel about me......the way I feel about you.
PC Japanese (JP): 私があなたを想っているように、……あなたも私を思っていて欲しい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私があなたを想っているように、……あなたも私を想っていて欲しい。
Russian (RU): Я хочу, чтобы ты чувствовал ко мне...... то же, что я к тебе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu quero que você sinta por mim......aquilo que eu sinto por você.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就像我在想著你一樣，……我希望你也能想著我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就像我在想着你一样，……我希望你也能想着我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Voglio che tu provi per me... ciò che io provo per te.

Steam (ST): We're both searching, trying to figure out the depths of the other's heart... in this mystery of love.
Umineko Project (UP): We're both exploring, trying to figure out the depths of the other's heart, ......in this mystery of love.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We're both searching, trying to figure out the depths of the other's heart, ......in this mystery of love.
PC Japanese (JP): それを探り合い、互いの心の深層を推理し合う、……これは私たちの、恋のミステリー。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを探り合い、互いの心の深層を推理し合う、……これは私たちの、恋のミステリー。
Russian (RU): Мы оба ищем, стремимся постичь глубины сердца другого...... в этой тайне любви.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ambos estamos explorando, tentando descobrir as profundezas do coração um do outro, ......neste mistério do amor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 彼此探尋對方的想法，互相推理對方的內心深處，……這就是我們的，愛情的推理劇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 彼此探寻对方的想法，互相推理对方的内心深处，……这就是我们的，爱情的推理剧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stiamo cercando entrambi, un modo per raggiungere gli abissi del cuore dell'altro... in questo mistero d'amore.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Nng, ...look how late it's gotten. I wonder if Aniki and the others are waiting for us."
Umineko Project (UP): "Nn, ......look how late it's gotten. I wonder if Aniki and the others are waiting for us."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ん、……もう、こんな時間だな。兄貴たちを待たせちゃってるかな」

Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, we should probably go back soon......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そろそろ戻った方がいい時間ですね……」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...Time seems to fly by when I'm talking with you, Shannon-chan."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Time seems to fly by when I'm talking with you, Shannon‐chan."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Time seems to fly by when I'm talking with you, Shannon-chan."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……紗音ちゃんと話してると、あっという間に時間が過ぎちまうな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……紗音ちゃんと話してると、あっという間に時間が過ぎちまうな」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O tempo voa quando estou conversando com você, Shannon‐chan."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……和纱音聊天，时间是唰地一下就过去了啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sembra che il tempo voli quando parlo con te, Shannon-chan."

Steam (ST): He seemed to be speaking the words of my heart.
Umineko Project (UP): He seemed to be speaking the words of my heart.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 私の心に浮かぶ言葉を、そっくりそのまま、彼は代弁してくれる。
Russian (RU): Он словно говорил словами моего сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele parecia estar falando as palavras do meu coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他只字不差地代我講出了，浮現於我內心的言語。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他只字不差地代我讲出了，浮现于我内心的言语。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che parlasse le parole del mio cuore.

Steam (ST): We were thinking the same thing, so the same words came out.
Umineko Project (UP): We were thinking the same thing, so the same words came out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We were thinking the same thing, so the same words came out.
PC Japanese (JP): 同じことを想い合ってるから、同じ言葉が出る。
Russian (RU): Мы думали об одном и том же, поэтому и слова выходили те же.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós estávamos pensando a mesma coisa, por isso as mesmas palavras vieram para fora.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 正因为我们都在想同样的事，所以才会讲出同样的话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensavamo la stessa cosa, quindi vennero fuori le stesse parole.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "I wish we could talk together like this forever... I hate clocks."
Umineko Project (UP): "I wish we could talk together like this forever...... I hate clocks."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I wish we could talk together like this forever... I hate clocks."
PC Japanese (JP): 「いつまでも二人きりでお話を出来たらいいのに……。時計の針が恨めしいです。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「いつまでも二人きりでお話を出来たらいいのに……。時計の針が恨めしいです」
Russian (RU): "Жаль, что мы не можем разговаривать друг с другом вечно... Ненавижу часы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu queria que pudéssemos conversar assim para sempre...... Eu odeio relógios."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「要是永远都能，只有我们两个地一起聊天，就好了……。时钟的针好可恨。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Desidero di poter parlare così per sempre... odio gli orologi."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Same here. Talking about this stuff with you is the most fun part of coming to Rokkenjima."
Umineko Project (UP): "Same here. Talking about this stuff with you is the most fun part of coming to Rokkenjima."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「俺もだぜ。六軒島で一番楽しいのは、こうして紗音ちゃんと話すことだからな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「俺もだぜ。六軒島で一番楽しいのは、こうして紗音ちゃんと話すことだからな」
Russian (RU): "Я тоже. Говорить с тобой обо всём этом — самая лучшая часть пребывания на Роккенджиме."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Digo o mesmo. Conversar com você sobre esse tipo de coisa é a parte mais divertida de vir para Rokkenjima."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我也一樣啊。畢竟，在六軒島最開心的事，就是像這樣和紗音聊天。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我也一样啊。毕竟，在六轩岛最开心的事，就是像这样和纱音聊天。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anch'io. Parlare di queste cose con te è la cosa più divertente del venire su Rokkenjima."

Steam (ST): When I saw that his smiling eyes were looking right at me, ...I turned away.
Umineko Project (UP): When I saw that his smiling eyes were looking right at me, ......I turned around.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 彼の微笑む瞳に私が映っているのを見た途端、……私は後を向いてしまう。
Russian (RU): Увидев, что его улыбающиеся глаза смотрят прямо на меня...... я отвернулась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando seu olhar sorridente olhou diretamente para mim, ......eu rapidamente me virei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 剛看到他微笑的瞳孔中浮現著我，……我就當即轉過了身去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 刚看到他微笑的瞳孔中浮现着我，……我就当即转过了身去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando vidi i suoi occhi sorridenti che mi guardavano... mi girai dall'altra parte.

Steam (ST): I couldn't let him see my suddenly red face.
Umineko Project (UP): I couldn't let him see my suddenly red face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I couldn't let him see my suddenly red face.

Russian (RU): Не могла позволить ему увидеть моё вдруг покрасневшее лицо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não tinha como deixá‐lo ver meu rosto vermelho.

Umineko Project (UP): "If only I could go out into the world at large, ......I'd be able to read so much more..."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私も、……外の世界へ出られたなら。……もっともっとたくさんの本を読めるのに」
